news.headline: One Archiving Platform for Every Conversation: Intermedia Adds Microsoft 365 Email to Its Intelligent Archiving Solution
news.summary: Intermedia Cloud Communications, a global leader in AI-powered communications and collaboration, today announced the addition of Microsoft 365 (M365) email to its Intelligent Archiving solution. news.headline: Top Funds Pour More Money Into This Stock Than Into Nvidia, Palantir
news.summary: Raking in more money from top funds than Nvidia, Microsoft and Palantir, AAR Corp looks to weather recent turbulence to take flight.

news.headline: NTT DATA Launches Global Business Unit for Microsoft Cloud to Accelerate Enterprise Transformation in the AI Era
news.summary: LONDON, August 07, 2025--NTT DATA, a global leader in digital business and technology services, today announced its NTT Data business unit for Microsoft Cloud to meet rising demand for secure, AI-driven enterprise cloud transformation. news.headline: King County's Facilities Management Division (FMD) Upgrades to Maximo Application Suite (MAS) 9.01 with Interloc Solutions
news.summary: King County's Facilities Management Division (FMD) officially went into production with version 9.0 of the IBM Maximo Application Suite (MAS) earlier this summer. news.summary: Vistra Corp. (NYSE: VST) today reported its second quarter 2025 financial results and other highlights.
